network

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Edge

  • public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object
    Symbolizes a link in a Network.
    Author:
    mesch
    See Also:
    Network, Node

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double auxFlow
      auxiliary flow for use in Network.restrictedInnerMasterProblem(RUM, double).
      private double b
      b coefficient as used in BPR formula time = freeFlowTime * (1 + b*(flow/capacity)^power
      private double capacity
      capacity practical capacity of link as used in BPR formula time = freeFlowTime * (1 + b*(flow/capacity)^power
      private double flow
      flow amount of traffic.
      private double freeFlowTime
      freeFlowTime of this edge
      private double genCost
      generalized cost defined by genCost
      private int head
      head id of node corresponding to origin of this edge
      private int id
      id of the edge, read from the node text file
      private double length
      length of this edge
      private int numPathsWithEdge
      the number of paths defined in some choice set that contain this edge.
      private double power
      power coefficient as used in BPR formula time = freeFlowTime * (1 + b*(flow/capacity)^power
      private int tail
      tail id of node corresponding to terminal of this edge
      private double time
      actual travel time on this edge

      java.lang.String toString()
      Prints a more useful expression when calling e.g.
      void updateCost(RUM rum)
      Updates the total travel time on this edge using its current flow and the BPR formula with coefficients as specified in the [network]_net.tntp file, and then updates the generalized cost of this edge using the specified RUM.
      private void updateTime()
      Updates the total travel time on the edge to correspond to the BPR formula evaluated with the current flow, using the BPR formula parameters b and power that were read into the edge at from the [network]_net.tntp file at instantiation.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • id

        private int id
        id of the edge, read from the node text file
        See Also:
        Network.Network(String)

      • tail

        private int tail
        tail id of node corresponding to terminal of this edge

      • head

        private int head
        head id of node corresponding to origin of this edge

      • capacity

        private double capacity
        capacity practical capacity of link as used in BPR formula time = freeFlowTime * (1 + b*(flow/capacity)^power

      • length

        private double length
        length of this edge

      • freeFlowTime

        private double freeFlowTime
        freeFlowTime of this edge

      • b

        private double b
        b coefficient as used in BPR formula time = freeFlowTime * (1 + b*(flow/capacity)^power

      • power

        private double power
        power coefficient as used in BPR formula time = freeFlowTime * (1 + b*(flow/capacity)^power

      • flow

        private double flow
        flow amount of traffic. Initialized as 0.

      • auxFlow

        private double auxFlow
        auxiliary flow for use in Network.restrictedInnerMasterProblem(RUM, double). Initialized as 0.

      • time

        private double time
        actual travel time on this edge

      • genCost

        private double genCost
        generalized cost defined by genCost

      • numPathsWithEdge

        private int numPathsWithEdge
        the number of paths defined in some choice set that contain this edge. Cannot be computed internally and is initialized as 0.
        See Also:
        OD.updatePathSizeFactors(RUM)

        • tail

        • current travel time
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • updateCost

        public void updateCost(RUM rum)
        Updates the total travel time on this edge using its current flow and the BPR formula with coefficients as specified in the [network]_net.tntp file, and then updates the generalized cost of this edge using the specified RUM.
        Parameters:
        rum - the RUM to define the generalized cost to assign
        See Also:
        updateTime()

      • updateTime

        private void updateTime()
        Updates the total travel time on the edge to correspond to the BPR formula evaluated with the current flow, using the BPR formula parameters b and power that were read into the edge at from the [network]_net.tntp file at instantiation.
